name: Go With The Grow
description:
Play as a ghost and complete puzzle platforms!

Move with AD or arrows,  jump with space and grow and shrink with mouse 1 or CTRL.

Includes 12 levels, all of them are unlocked from start. (Personal favorite lvl 10)

My second ever game jam submission!

Happy spring!

(going from lvl 7 to 8 can lag don't worry)

Used assets:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/2d-platformerassetspack-11...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/customizable-sky...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/icons/simple-button-set-01-153979
